question: You have been invited to deliver a speech about your country at an international meeting at an American college. Write a letter to the secretary of the international community.your letter, you should tell:accept an invitation and suggest preferable datestell them what your talks will be aboutand what equipment you require them to arrange.
text: I am writing this letter with regard to my lecture held at Centennial College next month.

Thank you for your letter, and it would be an absolute privilege for me to deliver a lecture at your college. Furthermore, I have a tedious week ahead, so I shall be available by next week, which is from the 4th of April till the 10th of April 2020.

I am a professor of history at Wilson College for the past five years. Moreover, I have researched and published many articles about the historical background of India. Therefore, I would be speaking about the rich culture and heritage of India. As you know that India has been the centre for import, export as well as trade for centuries. Additionally, I would also be including the lifestyle, tradition as well as ethnicity during earlier ages. Lastly, it would be about the importance of preserving such details and monuments of the historical era.

Since, I would be presenting my studies as well in my discourse, so I was hoping that you could arrange a projector for me and also a pointer would be very appreciated. Thank you for your consideration. I am very thrilled to get the opportunity to deliver a lecture in America.
I am looking forward to hearing from you soon.

error_list.error_des: It appears that you have an unnecessary comma after the subordinating conjunction Since. Consider removing the comma.
